name: Space Golf Free
description:
Fantastic 3d Mini Golf game in the space in a Fantastic Environment, 9 level available in this universal game, available also in iPod-iPhone and iPad version.
If you like this game already available the full version without Ads and with Fantastic 36 levels.
In first you can setup the start position, after in the course you can setup the direction. For the shot use the ball button, in the bottom left you can see the shot power.
